long_description: Cool graphics and quality construction make the Scott 540 ski poles the ideal tools to guide you down the slopes. P-Core grip system features a thermoplastic rubber that is injection-molded over a polypropylene core for a secure, comfortable grip. S2.5 shaft is manufactured with high-grade aluminum alloy and is computer engineered for excellent strength. Comfort straps include molded rubber platforms to support your hand; woven nylon straps are strong and durable. 2.36 in. disc basket blends aerodynamic efficiency and durability; ideal for packed snow conditions. Ice Tip offers superb hold in icy conditions. Scott 540 ski poles undergo an electrostatic paint process that delivers a highly durable finish and a clean, contemporary appearance.
